content: {"name": "Community Health Action of Staten Island - Community Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Mobile Food Pantry Scheduled available here: linktr.ee/chasinyc.", "email": "", "url": "linktr.ee/chasinyc", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2134 Richmond Ter", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10302", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6401964, "longitude": -74.13431539999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 808-1840", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "SNAP assistance available"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
